thread.title: BRIEF-WSI ‍confirmed That Board Received Letter From DPW Holdings

title: BRIEF-WSI ‍confirmed That Board Received Letter From DPW Holdings
text: 32 PM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-WSI ‍confirmed That Board Received Letter From DPW Holdings Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 26 (Reuters) - Wsi Industries Inc: * WSI INDUSTRIES SAYS ‍CONFIRMED THAT ON FEB 16, 2018 WSI BOARD OF DIRECTORS RECEIVED LETTER FROM DPW HOLDINGS - SEC FILING * WSI INDUSTRIES - REQUESTED DPW REGARDING PLANS,PROPOSALS RELATING TO WSI,SHAREHOLDERS IF DPW SUCCESSFUL IN TENDER OFFER TO CONTROL 50% OF CO‘S SHARES​ * WSI - CANNOT EVALUATE IF GRANTING REQUESTED SPECIAL EXCEPTIONS TO BE IN WSI SHAREHOLDERS' BEST INTERESTS, NOT KNOWING DPW'S PLANS AS 50% SHAREHOLDER​ Source text: ( bit.ly/2EVu2hQ ) Further company coverage:
